description: During your attendance of a religious ceremony a strange figure approaches you. A tall shadow-person covered in grey robes with their head hidden underneath a cowl. 'The time is due and short is the Grey One's return.' - they say - 'Follow his words and you shall achieve salvation. Denounce him and you shall be condemned'. Afterwards you feel a piece of paper slid into your hand. Before you realise the grey person is nowhere to be seen.

options.description: Burn the paper! Pretend nothing happened!

title: Robes of grey
